Types

VersionTags = Group[Version, GitThing]

    raises: [UnpackError], tags: [].}

proc releaseHashes(release: Release; head = ""): HashSet[Hash] {...}{.
    raises: [UnpackError, ValueError], tags: [].}
a set of hashes that should match valid values for the release 
proc releaseHashes(release: Release; thing: GitThing; head = ""): HashSet[Hash] {...}{.
    raises: [UnpackError, ValueError], tags: [].}
a set of hashes that should match valid values for the release; the thing is presumed to be an associated tag/commit/etc and we should include useful hashes for it

Iterators

iterator richen(tags: GitTagTable): tuple[release: Release, thing: GitThing] {...}{.
    raises: [Defect, ValueError, NPegException, Exception, UnpackError],
    tags: [RootEffect].}
yield releases that match the tags and the things they represent 
iterator matches(tags: GitTagTable; against: HashSet[Hash]): tuple[release: Release,
    thing: GitThing] {...}{.raises: [Defect, ValueError, NPegException, Exception,
                             UnpackError], tags: [RootEffect].}
see if any of the releases in the tag table will match against if so, yield the release and thing
